line.text: O call not me to justify the wrong
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That thy unkindness lays upon my heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Wound me not with thine eye but with thy tongue
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Use power with power and slay me not by art
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Tell me thou lov elsewhere but in my sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Dear heart forbear to glance thine eye aside
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: What need thou wound with cunning when thy might
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Is more than my oerpressed defence can bide
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Let me excuse thee ah my love well knows
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Her pretty looks have been mine enemies
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And therefore from my face she turns my foes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That they elsewhere might dart their injuries
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet do not so but since I am near slain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Kill me outright with looks and rid my pain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
